channel.title: Need help adding crowns to my client
channel.description: my client doesnt have any crowns whatsoever even the basic ones and its not just me that cant see my crown no-one can see anyones crown i tryed using galkons guide to adding custom crowns but still doesnt work anyone know what to do :confused:

item.title: Need help adding crowns to my client
item.dc:creator: @alexander_spicer alexander spicer
item.description:
@alexander_spicer wrote:

Check the server to see if it has this inside your player connecting method (usually in client.java):

if (playerRights == 3) { out.write(3); } else { out.write(playerRights); }

Read full topic
item.source: Need help adding crowns to my client
